TableName.description: Brief description of what this table represents (1-2 sentences)
TableName.businessPurpose: Detailed explanation of why this table exists and how it supports business processes
TableName.dataOwner: Team or role responsible for maintaining this data (e.g., 'Production Planning Team', 'Quality Assurance')
TableName.updateFrequency: How often this data changes (e.g., 'Real-time', 'Daily batch', 'Manual entry', 'On demand')
TableName.complianceNotes: Any regulatory or compliance considerations (e.g., '21 CFR Part 11', 'ISO 9001', 'Data Privacy')
integrations: List of external systems or modules that read/write this data
TableName.dataRetention: How long data is kept (e.g., '7 years', 'Indefinitely', 'Until part obsolescence')

examples.scenario: Description of a common use case or business scenario

sampleData.field3: Values should reflect actual business data patterns

examples.explanation: Brief explanation of what this example demonstrates

relatedTables: List of closely related tables that users might need to understand together
commonQueries: Description of typical queries or reports that use this table
Find all active work orders for a specific part
Generate quality metrics for last 30 days
